name: Delphia
headline: We build quantitative investment strategies improved by consumer data
description: Delphia believes data is the key to capital formation and economic empowerment. We build products that incentivize the contribution of proprietary data in order to generate an edge in financial markets. We believe that actively managing people’s data can unlock new forms of wealth creation for individual and institutional investors alike.

founders.name: Andrew Peek, Founder/CEO
founders.description: An entrepreneur and angel investor, Andrew is the founder of Agora Intelligence, makers of Tilt: a way for anyone to build their own index of stocks. Prior to Tilt, he co-founded Delphia: an investment collective where people pooled their data to access to quantitative investment strategies. Delphia built and sold a systematic (US equities) hedge fund and spun out three separate startups, one of which was Tilt. Prior to Delphia, Andrew sold a SaaS startup to Shopify.

founders.name: Cliff van der Linden
founders.description: Cliff is a computational social science professor and serial entrepreneur, having founded and led numerous companies including non-profit organizations and venture-backed technology start-ups. He is founder and CEO of Vox Pop Labs, a social enterprise that empowers informed decisions through innovative digital products and advanced analytics.

markdown:
raw_markdown='Delphia | Invest with your data, not your money.
[Delphia](http://delphia.com/</> "home")
## Delphia
Delphia is a collection of entrepreneurs who believe that in an AI-driven world, data is our most important asset.
We believe the best information is low-latency, asymmetric, and point-in-time; but most critically, that it can be priced.
[See what we launch next](http://delphia.com/<https:/discord.gg/PTCx5rd2Ws>)
[AI & National Policy ](http://delphia.com/<https:/zenodo.org/records/10845249>)
What we believe needs to be done to ensure a safe, competitive, and aligned AI future in the United States.
[Capital Markets & Data ](http://delphia.com/<https:/docs.delphia.com/the-delphia-thesis>)
How capital markets and alternative (consumer) data can offer us a lifeline to a Sovereign Wealth Fund.
[Letter from the CEO ](http://delphia.com/<https:/medium.com/@drupeek/4e98ede9019d>)
For Investors, Policymakers, Data Rights Advocates, and Entrepreneurs who may be learning of Delphia for the first time.
![](http://delphia.com)![](http://delphia.com/static/c700ec87468b7eea4d391867443221a0/bc8e0/triangle-bg.png)
![](http://delphia.com)![](http://delphia.com/static/952694ea36024a782c2f740198ae9ff8/bc8e0/triangle-bg-wide.png)
## Hedge funds get their edge by buying your:
  * credit card data
  * location data
  * Robinhood trades
  * browser history
  * financial history
  * credit card data
  * location data
  * Robinhood trades
  * browser history
  * financial history


![Video showing data and companies being analyzed to increase returns.](http://delphia.com/static/c1cca3c62abf0804a49d9b7a8a9a2639/9a8d7/hedge-fund-stream-frame.png)
## A Retrospective
Our JourneyOur Products
### Pre-Delphia
  * 2011
Future Delphia Co-founder, Cliff van der Linden, pioneers a new way to measure public opinion from big data
  * 2013
With a team of data scientists, van der Linden founds [Vox Pop Labs](http://delphia.com/<http:/www.voxpoplabs.com/>) to forecast real-world events
  * June 2016
Vox Pop Labs predicts several global political outcomes, including Brexit, 10 days before the vote
  * August 2017
Future Delphia CEO, Andrew Peek, and van der Linden adapt Vox Pops predictive models to financial markets
  * January 2018
Delphia spins out of Vox Pop Labs, is accepted into Y Combinator, and closes two rounds of funding within the year


### Delphia
  * 2019
Delphia stops selling its predictions to Wall Street and registers as an Investment Advisor with the SEC
  * June 2020
Delphia brings on Jonathan Briggs as Chief Investment Officer
  * April 2021
Delphia launches an institutional-grade market-neutral quant equity strategy
  * April 2022
Delphia's strategy achieves one of the all-time top 5 years of quant equity performance
  * June 2022
Multicoin Capital, with participation from Ribbit Capital and Valor, leads a $60m funding round into Delphia
  * 2024
Delphia shuts down its data reward token and robo-advisor, refocuses on professional investors.


### Delphia Holdings
  * March 2023
Delphia helps to establish Superset as a Data Trust to ensure 'fair trade' compensation for peoples' data
  * June 2023
Delphia open sources its backtesting framework, [InvestOS](http://delphia.com/<https:/github.com/forecastos/investos>), and spins out [ForecastOS](http://delphia.com/<https:/forecastos.com/>) as a new venture
  * May 2024
Delphia partners with an experienced group of asset management executives to grow its hedge fund, Oracle Alpha
  * Coming Soon
Delphia launches Tilt as a way for anyone to invest in the trends they believe in
  * Coming Soon
Delphia launches Backchannel as a way for experts to own and monetize their knowledge


### News Coverage
Algorithmic Stock Advisor Delphia Raises $60M Ahead of Rewards Token Launch Machine Learning Hedge Fund Hires AWS's Lead Scientist and Point72 Veteran Andrew Arnold
[Read More ](http://delphia.com/<https:/www.institutionalinvestor.com/article/2bstnox9764n3ivg6al8g/corner-office/machine-learning-hedge-fund-hires-awss-lead-scientist-and-point72-veteran-andrew-arnold> "Read More")
![](http://delphia.com)![](http://delphia.com/static/214a129ebc1f680f9fc94f4f38665e52/2f1b1/how-it-works-algo-background.jpg)
Delphia Raises $60 Million, Aims to Use Social Data to Power Algo Investing, Allowing Anyone to Invest Better
[Read More ](http://delphia.com/<https:/techcrunch.com/2022/06/08/multicoin-capital-leads-60m-investment-in-delphia-to-give-retail-investors-edge-against-hedge-funds/> "Read More")
How Delphia Hopes To Use Personal Data And Algorithms To Help Investors Beat The Market
[Read More ](http://delphia.com/<https:/www.benzinga.com/fintech/22/01/24823686/exclusive-how-delphia-hopes-to-use-personal-data-and-algorithms-to-help-investors-beat-the-market> "Read More")
![](http://delphia.com)![](http://delphia.com/static/f8a18a30e2d2e228406b873f8a2c7f22/2f1b1/orange-marble-1600-1600.jpg)
![](http://delphia.com)![](http://delphia.com/static/214a129ebc1f680f9fc94f4f38665e52/2f1b1/how-it-works-algo-background.jpg)
Delphia Raises $60 Million, Aims to Use Social Data to Power Algo Investing, Allowing Anyone to Invest Better
[Read More ](http://delphia.com/<https:/techcrunch.com/2022/06/08/multicoin-capital-leads-60m-investment-in-delphia-to-give-retail-investors-edge-against-hedge-funds/> "Read More")
With This Platform, Regular Folks Reap Benefits From Their Data—And So Do Individual Investors
[Read more ](http://delphia.com/<https:/www.forbes.com/sites/annefield/2019/12/11/with-this-platform-regular-folks-reap-benefits-from-their-data-and-so-do-individual-investors/> "Read more")
![](http://delphia.com)![](http://delphia.com/static/527094d0135b40d30173d9d2b566793d/2f1b1/dollarnote-bg.jpg)
Analyzing Data to Make Investment Decisions (Nasdaq Interview)
[Watch Now ](http://delphia.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=_o9b423CEqM> "Watch Now")
![](http://delphia.com/static/c7056a2b787cb50377e8d74b818fd064/8bf6f/forecastOS.png)
Delphia spins out ForecastOS – a way for anyone to build a quantitative investment strategy with confidence
[Get ForecastOS](http://delphia.com/<https:/forecastos.com/>)
![](http://delphia.com/static/90f083b3a069b07e535dfb530faadcf6/b334f/github-dark.png)
Delphia and ForecastOS open source an institutional-grade portfolio engineering and backtesting framework
[View on Github](http://delphia.com/<https:/github.com/forecastos/investos>)
![](http://delphia.com/static/1771859c13b093f2b84014be4f49ec3a/b135b/superset.png)
Delphia helps to establish Superset as a Data Trust to ensure "fair trade" compensation for peoples' data
[Read More](http://delphia.com/<https:/www.trustsuperset.com/>)
![](http://delphia.com/static/37e63d8745b18100144d940afa5ba5cd/0a14f/huggingface.png)
Delphia begins open sourcing parts of it's news classification engine on Hugging Face
[Read More](http://delphia.com/<https:/huggingface.co/Delphia/twitter-spam-classifier>)
![](http://delphia.com/static/4f9814ee556142fbdc4801c73272cb71/e314b/youtube.png)
Delphia's CEO interviews the Co-Founder of Cosmos on The Future of Wealth
[Watch on YouTube](http://delphia.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=lrkzyF7nfys>)
[Home Page](http://delphia.com/</> "Delphia.com")
  * [Contact](http://delphia.com/</contact>)


  * [Terms of Service](http://delphia.com/</terms-of-service>)
  * [Privacy Policy](http://delphia.com/</privacy-policy>)


© 2025 Delphia Technologies Inc. All rights reserved.

generated_description:
## Delphia: Investing with Your Data, Not Your Money

Founded in 2018, Delphia is a Toronto-based fintech company that's carving out a niche in the investment world by leveraging consumer data to shape innovative investment strategies. As part of Y Combinator’s Batch W18, Delphia positions itself at the intersection of technology and finance, believing that in today’s AI-driven landscape, data isn't just a byproduct—it’s the most critical asset.

### Mission and Vision
Delphia's mission revolves around **quantitative investment strategies** enhanced by consumer data. They strive to empower both individuals and institutional investors by transforming proprietary data into actionable investment insights. The underlying philosophy is that actively managing people's data can unlock new forms of wealth creation—a game-changer for those willing to participate.

### What They Do
At its core, Delphia is about harnessing data to gain an edge in financial markets. This means using insights from various data sources—like credit card transactions and browsing habits—to inform investment decisions. Traditional hedge funds often leverage this type of consumer information to bolster their profits. Delphia aims to level the playing field, allowing everyday investors to benefit from their own data without needing to risk their capital directly.

### Key Milestones
- **2011-2018**: Delphia’s journey begins with its co-founders, who were already pioneering data-driven approaches to public opinion and predictive analytics long before they launched Delphia per se.
- **2019**: Transitioned from offering predictions to Wall Street to becoming a registered Investment Advisor with the SEC.
- **2021-2022**: Launched a market-neutral quant equity strategy, marking one of their best years in quantitative performance.
- **2023**: Helped to establish Superset, a Data Trust for fair data compensation, and open-sourced their backtesting framework, InvestOS.

### Looking Ahead
Delphia isn't resting on its laurels. With a team of about 20 employees led by seasoned professionals, including CIO Jonathan Briggs, they're continually innovating. The firm has exciting plans, including:
- **Tilt**: A new platform for trend-based investments.
- **Backchannel**: A venture enabling experts to monetize their knowledge.

Additionally, Delphia has recently shifted its focus to professional investors after refining its core offerings.

### Why Delphia Matters
In a world where your data is often considered a commodity, Delphia is pioneering a new path. They empower consumers by sharing profits from data insights, thus returning value to the very people generating the data. This approach not only democratizes access to investment strategies but promotes a fairer economic system. If you're curious to see where they go next, check them out at [Delphia.com](http://delphia.com).

In summary, Delphia exemplifies how innovative thinking in fintech can lead to tangible benefits for everyone—transforming personal data into wealth, not just numbers on a balance sheet.
